README:
Files to LSST Overview paper, v1.0. Lower
resolution figures for astro-ph version are
provided separately.   (ZI, May 15, 2008)

To compile:

> latex lsst; latex lsst; 
> dvips -Ppdf -o lsst.ps lsst.dvi
> ps2pdf14 lsst.ps overview_v1.0.pdf

> latex lsst; latex lsst; dvips -Ppdf -o lsst.ps lsst.dvi; ps2pdf14 lsst.ps overview_v1.0.pdf
description: Latex and figures for LSST overview paper
README.md:
LSST overview paper, available as
http://arxiv.org/abs/0805.2366

Master branch gives the latest version (the same as posted to arXiv)

References are done manually (with bibitem list at the end of lsst.tex)

To compile and make lsst.pdf:
> pdflatex lsst

Please send questions and comments to Zeljko Ivezic (ivezic@astro.washington.edu)
